articles.description: Ring is opening its lost-pet-finding Search Party feature to non-Ring owners and donating $1 million to put cameras in animal shelters.
articles.content: Its also donating $1 million to bring Ring cameras to animal shelters across the US. Its also donating $1 million to bring Ring cameras to animal shelters acros… [+193 chars]
